casebody.data:
SCHMEER, Appellant, v. GASLIGHT CO. OF SYRACUSE, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. December 8, 1893.) Action by Daniel Schmeer, as administrator, etc., against the Gaslight Company of Syracuse.

Argued before HARDIN, P. J„ and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs. See 20 N. Y. Supp 168.
